Symbol.Script_3D:
!-----------3d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
! Cyclone Dust Collector
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- HOTSPOTS --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN unID = 10 HOTSPOT -A/2+legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, 0, unID, supportHeight, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2+legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, -1, unID, supportHeight, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2+legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, supportHeight, unID, supportHeight, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -A/2+legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, 0, unID, supportHeight, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2+legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, -1, unID, supportHeight, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2+legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, supportHeight, unID, supportHeight, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A/2-legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, 0, unID, supportHeight, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, -1, unID, supportHeight, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, supportHeight, unID, supportHeight, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A/2-legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, 0, unID, supportHeight, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, -1, unID, supportHeight, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, supportHeight, unID, supportHeight, 2: unID=unID+1 ELSE HOTSPOT -A/2+legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, supportHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2+legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, supportHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, supportHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, supportHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 ENDIF
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN GROUP "lower_legs" ADD -A/2, -B/2, 0 BLOCK legWidth, legWidth, 1.30*supScale-legWidth ADDx A-legWidth BLOCK legWidth, legWidth, 1.30*supScale-legWidth ADDy B-legWidth BLOCK legWidth, legWidth, 1.30*supScale-legWidth ADDx -A+legWidth BLOCK legWidth, legWidth, 1.30*supScale-legWidth DEL 4
ADD -A/2+legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, 1.30*supScale-legWidth BLOCK legWidth, legWidth, supportHeight-1.30*supScale+legWidth ADDx A-legWidth*2 BLOCK legWidth, legWidth, supportHeight-1.30*supScale+legWidth ADDy B-legWidth*2 BLOCK legWidth, legWidth, supportHeight-1.30*supScale+legWidth ADDx -A+legWidth*2 BLOCK legWidth, legWidth, supportHeight-1.30*supScale+legWidth DEL 4 ENDGROUP
GROUP "lower_frame" ADDz 1.30*supScale-legWidth PRISM_ 10, legWidth, -A/2, -B/2, 15, A/2, -B/2, 15, A/2, B/2, 15, -A/2, B/2, 15, -A/2, -B/2, -1, -A/2+legWidth, -B/2+legWidth, 15, A/2-legWidth, -B/2+legWidth, 15, A/2-legWidth, B/2-legWidth, 15, -A/2+legWidth, B/2-legWidth, 15, -A/2+legWidth, -B/2+legWidth, -1 DEL 1
ADDz supportHeight-legWidth PRISM_ 10, legWidth, -A/2+legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, 15, A/2-legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, 15, A/2-legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, 15, -A/2+legWidth/2, B/2-legWidth/2, 15, -A/2+legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, -1, -A/2+legWidth*1.5, -B/2+legWidth*1.5, 15, A/2-legWidth*1.5, -B/2+legWidth*1.5, 15, A/2-legWidth*1.5, B/2-legWidth*1.5, 15, -A/2+legWidth*1.5, B/2-legWidth*1.5, 15, -A/2+legWidth*1.5, -B/2+legWidth*1.5, -1 DEL 1 ENDGROUP
result = ADDGROUP("lower_legs","lower_frame") PLACEGROUP result
KILLGROUP "lower_legs" KILLGROUP "lower_frame"
CYLIND 0.85*supScale, A/2-legWidth-0.10 ADDz 0.90*supScale CYLIND 0.30*supScale, 0.125*wScale ADDz 0.30*supScale CONE 1.20*supScale, 0.125*wScale, A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02, 90, 90 DEL 2
ADDz supportHeight-legWidth CYLIND ZZYZX-supportHeight-0.30-(ZZYZX-ConPosZ_1-0.15)+legWidth, A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02 DEL 1 ELSE ADD -A/2, -B/2, 0 BLOCK A, B, 1.30*supScale DEL 1 ADD -A/2+legWidth/2, -B/2+legWidth/2, 1.30*supScale BLOCK A-legWidth, B-legWidth, 1.20*supScale DEL 1 ADDz supportHeight CYLIND ZZYZX-supportHeight-0.30-(ZZYZX-ConPosZ_1-0.15), A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02 DEL 1 ENDIF
ADDz ConPosZ_1+0.15 CYLIND ZZYZX-ConPosZ_1-0.15, 0.15*wScale DEL 1
rr = A/2-legWidth ADDz ConPosZ_1-0.15 !ZZYZX-0.80 PRISM_ 4, 0.30, A/2-legWidth/2, -rr, 15, 0, -rr, 79, SQR(rr^2-(rr-0.30)^2), -(rr-0.30), 1015, A/2-legWidth/2, -(rr-0.30), 15 DEL 1
CUTPOLYA 2, 2, 0, 0, 0, 915, A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02, 360, 4015
ADD -A/2+legWidth/2, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02), ConPosZ_2-0.15 BLOCK A/2-legWidth/2, 0.30, 0.30 DEL 1
CUTEND
ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1+ConWallThickness_1*2 ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1+ConWallThickness_1*2
ADD A/2-legWidth/2, -A/2+legWidth+0.15, ConPosZ_1 DIM StraightPosition[3][3] StraightPosition[1][1] = 0 StraightPosition[1][2] = 0 StraightPosition[1][3] = 0
StraightPosition[2][1] = 1 StraightPosition[2][2] = 0 StraightPosition[2][3] = 0
StraightPosition[3][1] = 0 StraightPosition[3][2] = 1 StraightPosition[3][3] = 0
DIM ConnectionData[2][26] FOR i = 1 TO 2 FOR j = 1 TO 26 ConnectionData[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i
ConnectionData[1][12] = 0.30 ConnectionData[1][13] = 0.30 ConnectionData[1][21] = 1
ConnectionData[2][12] = ConWidth_1 ConnectionData[2][13] = ConDepth_1 ConnectionData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]
CALL "MEP_m_Duct_4" PARAMETERS MEP_Position = StraightPosition, MEP_NumberConnections = 2, MEP_NumConnectionData = ConnectionData, MEP_StraightLength = 0.2875, duct_show = 1, showHtps = 0, gs_DuctMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen DEL 1
ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2+ConWallThickness_2*2 ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2+ConWallThickness_2*2
ADD -A/2+legWidth/2, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02)+0.15, ConPosZ_2 ROTz 180
ConnectionData[2][12] = ConWidth_2 ConnectionData[2][13] = ConDepth_2 ConnectionData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21]
CALL "MEP_m_Duct_4" PARAMETERS MEP_Position = StraightPosition, MEP_NumberConnections = 2, MEP_NumConnectionData = ConnectionData, MEP_StraightLength = 0.2875, duct_show = 1, showHtps = 0, gs_DuctMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen DEL 2
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 4, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 4, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData END
Symbol.Script_2D:
!-----------2d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_2D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
! Cyclone Dust Collector
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- HOTSPOTS --- !
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
PUT -A/2, -B/2, 1, -A/2, B/2, 1, A/2, B/2, 1, A/2, -B/2, 1, -A/2, -B/2, -1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
PUT -A/2+legWidth/2, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02), 1, 0, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02), 1, 0, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02)+0.30, 1, -A/2+legWidth/2, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02)+0.30, 1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
rr = A/2-legWidth PUT A/2-legWidth/2, -rr, 1, 0, -rr, 1, SQR(rr^2-(rr-0.30)^2), -(rr-0.30), 1001, A/2-legWidth/2, -(rr-0.30), 1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1+ConWallThickness_1*2 ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2+ConWallThickness_2*2
PUT -A/2+legWidth/2, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02), 1, -A/2+legWidth/2, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02-0.30), 1, -A/2+legWidth/2-0.2875, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02-0.15)+ConWidth_2/2, 1, -A/2+legWidth/2-0.2875, -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02-0.15)-ConWidth_2/2, 1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
PUT A/2-legWidth/2, -rr, 1, A/2-legWidth/2, -(rr-0.30), 1, A/2-legWidth/2+0.2875, -(rr-0.15)+ConWidth_1/2, 1, A/2-legWidth/2+0.2875, -(rr-0.15)-ConWidth_1/2, 1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
CIRCLE2 0, 0, 0.15*wScale ENDIF
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 -SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED))+SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND SYMB_MIRRORED)
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 0, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
!-----------Основной--------------------- success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_2D_m",gs_detlevel_2D_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_3D_m", gs_detlevel_3D_m) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All isMep=1 RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name ! Cyclone Dust Collector
EPS = 0.0001
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF A < 0.65 THEN A = 0.65 VALUES "A" RANGE [0.65, ] IF supportHeight < 0.40 THEN supportHeight = 0.40 VALUES "supportHeight" RANGE [0.40, ] ENDIF
wScale = A/1.125 legWidth = 0.10 supScale = supportHeight/2.50
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Cyclone Dust Collector
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_set_str[3][2] ui_set_str[1][1] = "(A) "+`Размер` ui_set_str[2][1] = "(B) "+`Высота` ui_set_str[3][1] = "(C) "+`Высота Опоры`
ui_set_str[1][2] = "A" ui_set_str[2][2] = "ZZYZX" ui_set_str[3][2] = "supportHeight"
DIM ui_set_attr[4][9] FOR i = 2 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 9 ui_set_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_set_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[1][2] = 3 ui_set_attr[1][3] = 220 ui_set_attr[1][4] = 50 ui_set_attr[1][5] = 127 ui_set_attr[1][6] = 90 ui_set_attr[1][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[1][8] = 128 ui_set_attr[1][9] = 23
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[2] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_set_str = ui_set_str, ui_set_attr = ui_set_attr, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
setPage = 1 ui_cur_page = 0 FOR j = 1 TO VARDIM1(ui_page_idx) IF ui_page_idx[j] = setPage THEN ui_cur_page = j NEXT j
IF ABS(gs_ui_current_page - ui_cur_page) < EPS THEN UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
UI_PICT 1, 25, 45, 156, 200, 1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Cyclone Dust Collector
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF SetProgram THEN LOCK "A", "B", "ZZYZX", "supportHeight"
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 2
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Впускное Соединение Воздуховода`
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_1 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_1 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_1" ELSE VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0,] IF ConDepth_1 < 0.001 THEN ConDepth_1 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0,] ENDIF
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_1 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_1 = ConLength_1
ConPosX_1 = A/2-legWidth/2+0.2875-ConLength_1 PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = -A/2+legWidth+0.15 IF ConPosZ_1 < supportHeight+0.45 THEN ConPosZ_1 = supportHeight+0.45 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE [supportHeight+0.45, ] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Выпускное Соединение Воздуховода`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_2 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_2 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0,]
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21] - 2) < EPS THEN ConDepth_2 = ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_2" ELSE IF ConDepth_2 < 0.001 THEN ConDepth_2 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ENDIF VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0,] ENDIF
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_2 = ConWallThickness_2*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_2 = ConLength_2
ConPosX_2 = -A/2+legWidth/2-0.2875+ConLength_2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = -(A/2-legWidth*1.5-0.02)+0.15 IF ConPosZ_2 < supportHeight+0.15 THEN ConPosZ_2 = supportHeight+0.15 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF VALUES "ConPosZ_2" RANGE [supportHeight+0.15, ConPosZ_1-0.30] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN B = A PARAMETERS B = B
IF ZZYZX < ConPosZ_1+0.65 THEN ZZYZX = ConPosZ_1+0.65 PARAMETERS ZZYZX = ZZYZX ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [ConPosZ_1+0.65, ] ENDIF
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
